channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress Software Corporation -- Chef Automate

item.title: CVE-2023-40050|2024-08-02T18:24:54.691Z -- progress%20software%20corporation -- chef%20automate
item.description: Upload profile either through API or user interface in Chef Automate prior to and including version 4.10.29 using InSpec check command with maliciously crafted profile allows remote code execution.
